title: BrainStuff Classics: Why Do Some People Faint At The Sight of Blood?
itunes:title: BrainStuff Classics: Why Do Some People Faint At The Sight of Blood?
description:
Even though only 3-4% of people have a phobia of seeing blood, about 15% of people will faint at the sight. Learn why in this classic episode of BrainStuff.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
